Atlanta.Home Park, Atlanta:
Home Park is a neighborhood of Atlanta in Georgia, USA. It is bordered on the south by Georgia Tech, on the west by the railroad yards adjacent to Marietta Street and Brady Avenue, on the north by 16th Street at Atlantic Station, and on the east by Techwood Drive at I-75/85 (the Downtown Connector).
The neighborhood is known as West Midtown Atlanta since it lies on the west side of the Downtown Connector.
The residential district is bordered by Northside Drive, Techwood Drive, 10th Street, and 16th Street.
